abstract: Mosque in Yemeni capital Sana is being used as field hospital by volunteers treating protesters who have been injured in clashes with security forces of Pres Ali Abdullah Saleh.
snippet: When the demonstrations started in Yemen’s capital, Sana, volunteers turned a mosque into a field clinic to treat wounds.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: When the demonstrations started in Yemen’s capital, Sana, volunteers turned a mosque into a field clinic to treat wounds.

headline.main: From Mosque to MASH Unit in Yemeni Crisis Zone
headline.print_headline: From Mosque to MASH Unit in Yemeni Crisis Zone
headline.seo: Yemen Mosque Becomes E.R. for Protesters
